Durbin: s staff did not provide any records, studies, or other supporting evidence to back up the claim when asked.
Experts: including Georgetown University public policy professor Harry Holzer, disagreed with Durbin's claim and stated that the U.S. economy is not worse than any other country by a factor of three.
Our World in Data: a nonprofit based at Oxford University, published a study comparing the economic impacts of the pandemic among 38 countries based on GDP, which showed that the U.S. ranked above 24 other countries in a comparison to the same period in 2019.
